scripts.build-spec: mkdir -p src/relay/graphql; cp node_modules/spec-md/css/* src/relay/graphql; spec-md graphql/Mutations.md > src/relay/graphql/mutations.htm; spec-md graphql/ObjectIdentification.md > src/relay/graphql/objectidentification.htm; spec-md graphql/Connections.md > src/relay/graphql/connections.htm
